ingredients.ingredient: 2 (6.5 ounce) jars marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers, drained

cookingTips: Chop artichokes to uniform size for even texture distribution
Drain canned chiles well to control the spice level and prevent sogginess
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This dip gets its kick from canned green chiles. How will you balance the heat with the creamy base?
